title: LFT s4 jungler
body:
play most meta junglers but mains would be ekko, nid, lee
can adapt any if need be
also can support or mid

replies.body:
If you would like to still join a team, Add me 

Arrabbiata

This team is
- a casual team
- no flaming, we are here to have fun
- no blaming, we are here to learn
- play at LEAST once a week, we will aim to play more than once a week possibly 3-5 times hopefully.
